overview: Dramatizes Chris Elkins' experiences with the Unification Church. His entrance into the cult, his disillusionment, and his eventual departure from the cult are especially emphasized. Based on the book "Heavenly Deception" by Chris Elkins.
tagline: A TRUE STORY - At last, here is a motion picture that takes a serious dramatic look at one of the fastest growing cults in America today, Rev. SUN MYUNG MOON'S Unification Church!
title: Heavenly Deception
